title: Lemon Aioli
directions: Process the egg, lemon juice, mustard, garlic, salt, sugar, and cayenne in food processor until combined, about 5 seconds.
With the processor running, slowly drizzle in vegetable oil until emulsified and the mixture is thick, about 2 minutes.
Scrape down the sides of the bowl with a rubber-spatula and continue to process 5 seconds longer.
Transfer to a jar and stir in the olive oil.
Affix the jar lid and refrigerate until ready to use (can be refrigerated for up to a week).
